name: A Square Robbery
description:
You are a square. You have never ammassed to anything in live until you decide to rob the most secure room in all the land.

Good luck.

Gravity shifting platformer! Steal the coins from the one room & don't die!

Arrow keys, AD or Gamepad to Move

W or Gamepad A to Jump

F to Enter Fullscreen ESC to Exit

Blue Zone = Normal Speed

Orange Zone = Half Speed

Green Zone = Double Speed

Purple Zone = Checkpoint
